channel.title: Client on Mac
channel.description:
Can someone look at these and help me out on this?
This is what i have in to run the client. @echo off Title RS3Now Client cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause
This is the error that i am getting. JNLParseException[ Could not parse launch file. Error at line 0.] at com.sun.javaws.jnl.XMLFormat.parse(XMLFormat.java:69) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:57) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:64) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:402) at com.sun.javaws.Main.launchApp(Main.java:308) at com.sun.javaws.Main.continueInSecureThread(Main.java:252) at com.sun.javaws.Main$1.run(Main.java:111) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:613)
And the Wrapped Exception. Failed to find the '<' charater that marks the end of a CDATA element. Exception parsing xml at line 0 at com.sun.deploy.xml.XMLParser.skipPCData(XMLParser.java:182) at com.sun.deploy.xml.XMLParser.nextToken(XMLParser.java:100) at com.sun.deploy.xml.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser.java:58) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.XMLFormat.parse(XMLFormat.java:67) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:57) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:64) at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:402) at com.sun.javaws.Main.launchApp(Main.java:308) at com.sun.javaws.Main.continueInSecureThread(Main.java:252) at com.sun.javaws.Main$1.run(Main.java:111) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:613)
Any ideas???

item.title: Client on Mac
item.dc:creator: @Edp32281 Edp32281
item.description:
@Edp32281 wrote:

Can someone look at these and help me out on this?

This is what i have in to run the client.
@echo off
Title RS3Now Client
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

This is the error that i am getting.
JNLParseException[ Could not parse launch file. Error at line 0.]
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.XMLFormat.parse(XMLFormat.java:69)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:57)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:64)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:402)
at com.sun.javaws.Main.launchApp(Main.java:308)
at com.sun.javaws.Main.continueInSecureThread(Main.java:252)
at com.sun.javaws.Main$1.run(Main.java:111)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:613)

And the Wrapped Exception.
Failed to find the ‘<’ charater that marks the end of a CDATA element. Exception parsing xml at line 0
at com.sun.deploy.xml.XMLParser.skipPCData(XMLParser.java:182)
at com.sun.deploy.xml.XMLParser.nextToken(XMLParser.java:100)
at com.sun.deploy.xml.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser.java:58)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.XMLFormat.parse(XMLFormat.java:67)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:57)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:64)
at com.sun.javaws.jnl.LaunchDescFactory.buildDescriptor(LaunchDescFactory.java:402)
at com.sun.javaws.Main.launchApp(Main.java:308)
at com.sun.javaws.Main.continueInSecureThread(Main.java:252)
at com.sun.javaws.Main$1.run(Main.java:111)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:613)

Any ideas???

Read full topic
